People can\'t participate after contest ends
People can participate after contest end, but will not be part of the contest winner
Immediately after answer submission by participant
If contest evaluation mode is not automatic then the correct answer will be visible after evaluation done
Always update Leader Board on participant\'s performance
Participants can see their own position only
Show result after the qxm expire date
If qxm has expiration date, you can use this option
Enrollment creates an extra step to participate your Qxm. Each participant has to be approved by you in order to participate in the Qxm.
You can not participate in your own Qxm
You can not enroll in your own Qxm

This is the Follower channel. The user gets notification of new followers.
This is the Qxm channel. The user gets notification of new Qxms.
This is the Private Qxm channel. The user gets notification of all Private Qxms through this channel.
This is the Qxm Enroll channel. The user gets notification of all Enrollments of a Qxm through this channel.
This is the Qxm Evaluation channel. The user gets notification of pending evaluation of a Qxm through this channel.
This is the Qxm Result channel. The user gets notification of the published result of a Qxm.
This is the Group channel. The user gets notification of the groups using this channel.

When evaluation type is manual, you have to evaluate all the answers manually by yourself.
When evaluation type is semi automatic, \"Multiple Choice\" will be evaluated automatically. But, you have to manually evaluate \"Fill in the Blanks\" or \"Short Answer\".
When evaluation type is automatic, all the answers will be evaluated automatically based on your reference answer during question making.
You can start exam any time by clicking the start button.
By login or sign up, you agree with our terms and policy.
